getting-started-1.title: Definition of Scrum | 01
getting-started-1.sentence: Scrum is a lightweight <framework> that helps people, teams and organizations generate <value> through <adaptive> solutions for <complex> problems.

getting-started-2.title: Definition of Scrum | 02
getting-started-2.sentence: The Scrum framework is purposefully <incomplete> . Rather than provide people with detailed <instructions>, the rules of Scrum <guide> their relationships and interactions.
